name: Career Website Wireframe Design
description:
1. Modern, Clean & Minimalist
  2. Dedicated Job Page
  3. Amazing Application System
  4. User Management
  5. Applicant, Employer & Owner Module
  6. Easy Search Filter
  7. Subscription Module
  8. Registration System


This wireframe is a clean and minimalist website designed for job searching and posting and all employment-related businesses. Each job position have a dedicated page where the employer can show all job description details with an easy apply system. The website wireframe include also an easy search filter system for showing all available position and you can apply with a multiplies steps qualification module.
